reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute and of nice quality. However, the sizing receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting that it runs small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute sweater!
items.body: I ordered a Medium and Large in Navy in this sweater (usually wear a Medium) and that is the size I kept. The Large was TOO big everywhere. This sweater does have a different fit: it is a bit cropped and the sleeves are fuller, but it is still very cute. Don't know why some buyers complained about the dog graphics as the patterns on the sweaters I received were very clear and nicely done. Wore it recently with navy leggings & received several compliments on it while I was out shopping! Read more
items.author: katie st. claire

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and quality
items.body: Love this sweater! Actually good quality! Fits great and is super soft! Definitely gonna order a different color! Read more
items.author: mh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Thick and nice quality - only complaint is it’s slightly short so I’d say it fits more like a juniors sweater than a woman’s - overall a great buy! Read more
items.author: Tori Victoria

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not True to Size
items.body: I'm returning this item. It's cute, but I ordered a large, and it's more like a medium - or even a small. The product photos look like a traditional-type, full sweater, but it's more of a cropped style. The arms are disproportionately long to the torso. The fabric itself too was kind of "sealed" down, like it had been put under an iron or heat source for too long. The colors are bright and vibrant, it's soft to the touch, no loose threads or open seams, so the quality of the construction seems to be fine ... But the fit is so off, that even if the fabric didn't seem to be heat-damaged, I'd have to return it. Do not recommend this item. Read more
items.author: UberFoodie

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Way too small
items.body: Really let down by this. Ordered an XL and it’s the size of a small or if pushing it MAYBE Medium. And I missed the return window because it was a Christmas gift. Sigh. Read more
items.author: Fallon C

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars No sleeves
items.body: It came as a vest and not a sweater/sweatshirt. It is still cute, but not what I thought it would be. Read more
items.author: twinsfan1

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t look S good as the picture but still good for the price
items.author: LorrieA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredibly cute, soft, high quality, and FUN
items.body: Swear Cider has THE cutest animal designs. I have a few dog themed tops by them and they're all AMAZING and fun. This is no exception. With this sweater, the print is built into the fabric so there's absolutely no chance of flaking, fading, or losing the imagery. I'm typically a 36D/38D bust and have been actively losing weight. So far in Cider tops I've been ordering XL and they all fit comfortably with some stretchy leeway, and flattering. With this top, as it's a medium thick sweater- it'll still look and feel amazing during my weight loss journey. Even if I gained a little instead- the four way stretch would accommodate a size up, it would just look slightly more cropped. The hem and the sleeves are both slightly cuffed to create cinching and ballooning moments. I like to pull the hem up a little to make it slightly more cropped to the top part looks more puffy to create a nice hourglass. The sleeves end at right about my thumb knuckle and even without pulling them up they naturally have a bishop/lantern shape. Due to the shape AND the stretch- this is definitely a win for larger armed girlies. I ordered the navy blue and in person it is LOVELY. The rich blue contrasts lovely with the colors they chose for the dogs and the cream lining they have at the neck, sleeve, and hemline. There was no dye bleeding on any of my other clothes during the wash, no shrinkage, loose threads, or seam splitting. This is THE perfect, fun, flirty holiday sweater you can wear to work, a family function, or out with friends. Currently this is on sale for 30% off but even at full price I say this sweater is well worth it. It comes in a wine red as well so so I'd even say- stack up! Read more
items.author: Brittney

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
